name: Findnflee
description:
[ESP]

Movimiento: W,A,S,D
Generación de escenario procedural.
Generación de llaves aleatoria.
Consigue abrir los tres candados, encontrando sus llaves correspondientes,  para escapar y sobrevivir.

Inicialmente se pensó para ser jugado en navegador web, pero los efectos y gráficos no son soportados.

[ENG]

Movement: W,A,S,D
Procedural scene generation.
Random key generation.
Get open the three padlocks, finding their corresponding keys, to escape and survive.

It was initially intended to be played in a web browser, but the effects and graphics are not supported.

[ScreenShots] [GamePlay]
